Comment.Content:
Great writeup. This was my first year at CodeMash too. I really enjoyed it and I hope I can attend it again next year. I will try to bring the family next time too.
My only complaint was the network was ungodly slow. Other than that pretty much all the sessions were great. A wide choice of topics and the hotel and food were great.
Joe O'Brien's Rafactoring the Programmer and Mary's Lean Keynote were very memorable and was what I needed coming back to work starting off the 2010 with positive motivation to improve my skillset and work environment.
Comment.TargetTitle: Notes and personal retrospective from my first Codemash.
Comment.Author: Frank
